PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02882024-04-12GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (Sudan) Permit Authorization Order
PrecisSPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SUDAN) PERMIT AUTHORIZATION ORDER in order to authorize the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any individual or entity in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0062 Publication Date: 2024-04-24
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SUDAN) PERMIT AUTHORIZATION ORDER in order to authorize the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any individual or entity in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the Regulations.
